lead_paragraph: An Australian asked for help years later to find out what had happened to a Palestinian, and he learned the money had aided the boy’s community — while the family never understood the cards he sent.

headline.print_headline: Tracking the Mystery of a Charity’s Sponsored Child
headline.main: A World Vision Donor Sponsored a Boy. The Outcome Was a Mystery to Both.

snippet: An Australian asked for help years later to find out what had happened to a Palestinian, and he learned the money had aided the boy’s community — while the family never understood the cards he sent....
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; Diaa Hadid describes helping policeman track down Othman Sabateen, Palestinian boy who he donated money to through charity World Vision, in order to find out what became of him; family of Othman, who has reached age of 18, says they never received money, which charity explains funds village projects rather than individuals.
